mn103:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava pisinarayam viharati baliharane vanasande.
mn103:2.2: ‘civarahetu va samano gotamo dhammam deseti, pindapatahetu va samano gotamo dhammam deseti, senasanahetu va samano gotamo dhammam deseti, itibhavabhavahetu va samano gotamo dhammam deseti’”ti?
mn103:2.3: “Na kho no, bhante, bhagavati evam hoti:
mn103:2.4: ‘civarahetu va samano gotamo dhammam deseti, pindapatahetu va samano gotamo dhammam deseti, senasanahetu va samano gotamo dhammam deseti, itibhavabhavahetu va samano gotamo dhammam deseti’”ti.
mn103:2.5: “Na ca kira vo, bhikkhave, mayi evam hoti:
mn103:2.7: itibhavabhavahetu va samano gotamo dhammam deseti’ti;
mn103:2.8: atha kinti carahi vo, bhikkhave, mayi hoti”ti?
mn103:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ye vo maya dhamma abhinna desita, seyyathidam—
mn103:3.2: cattaro satipatthana cattaro sammappadhana cattaro iddhipada pancindriyani panca balani satta bojjhanga ariyo atthangiko maggo, tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamanehi avivadamanehi sikkhitabbam.
mn103:4.1: Tesanca vo, bhikkhave, samagganam sammodamananam avivadamananam sikkhatam siyamsu dve bhikkhu abhidhamme nanavada.
mn103:5.2: ‘imesam kho ayasmantanam atthato ceva nanam byanjanato ca nanan’ti, tattha yam bhikkhum suvacataram manneyyatha so upasankamitva evamassa vacaniyo:
mn103:5.3: ‘ayasmantanam kho atthato ceva nanam, byanjanato ca nanam.
mn103:5.5: yatha atthato ceva nanam, byanjanato ca nanam.

mn103:9.1: Tesanca vo, bhikkhave, samagganam sammodamananam avivadamananam sikkhatam siya annatarassa bhikkhuno apatti siya vitikkamo,
mn103:10.1: tatra, bhikkhave, na codanaya taritabbam. Puggalo upaparikkhitabbo:
mn103:10.2: ‘iti mayhanca avihesa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghato, paro hi puggalo akkodhano anupanahi adalhaditthi suppatinissaggi, sakkomi caham etam puggalam akusala vutthapetva kusale patitthapetun’ti.
mn103:11.2: ‘mayham kho avihesa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghato, paro hi puggalo kodhano upanahi adalhaditthi suppatinissaggi, sakkomi caham etam puggalam akusala vutthapetva kusale patitthapetum.
mn103:11.3: Appamattakam kho panetam yadidam—parassa puggalassa upaghato.
mn103:11.5: svaham sakkomi etam puggalam akusala vutthapetva kusale patitthapetun’ti.
mn103:12.2: ‘mayham kho vihesa bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghato. Paro hi puggalo akkodhano anupanahi dalhaditthi duppatinissaggi, sakkomi caham etam puggalam akusala vutthapetva kusale patitthapetum.
mn103:12.5: svaham sakkomi etam puggalam akusala vutthapetva kusale patitthapetun’ti.

mn103:15.1: Tesanca vo, bhikkhave, samagganam sammodamananam avivadamananam sikkhatam annamannassa vacisamharo uppajjeyya ditthipalaso cetaso aghato appaccayo anabhiraddhi.
mn103:15.2: Tattha ekatopakkhikanam bhikkhunam yam bhikkhum suvacataram manneyyatha so upasankamitva evamassa vacaniyo:
mn103:15.3: ‘yam no, avuso, amhakam samagganam sammodamananam avivadamananam sikkhatam annamannassa vacisamharo uppanno ditthipalaso cetaso aghato appaccayo anabhiraddhi, tam janamano samano garaheyya’ti.
mn103:15.4: Samma byakaramano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam byakareyya:
mn103:15.5: ‘yam no, avuso, amhakam samagganam sammodamananam avivadamananam sikkhatam annamannassa vacisamharo uppanno ditthipalaso cetaso aghato appaccayo anabhiraddhi, tam janamano samano garaheyyati.
mn103:15.6: Etam panavuso, dhammam appahaya nibbanam sacchikareyya’ti.
mn103:15.7: Samma byakaramano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam byakareyya:
mn103:15.8: ‘etam, avuso, dhammam appahaya na nibbanam sacchikareyya’ti.
mn103:16.1: Athaparesam ekatopakkhikanam bhikkhunam yam bhikkhum suvacataram manneyyatha, so upasankamitva evamassa vacaniyo:
mn103:16.2: ‘yam no, avuso, amhakam samagganam sammodamananam avivadamananam sikkhatam annamannassa vacisamharo uppanno ditthipalaso cetaso aghato appaccayo anabhiraddhi, tam janamano samano garaheyya’ti.
mn103:16.3: Samma byakaramano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam byakareyya:
mn103:16.4: ‘yam no, avuso, amhakam samagganam sammodamananam avivadamananam sikkhatam annamannassa vacisamharo uppanno ditthipalaso cetaso aghato appaccayo anabhiraddhi tam janamano samano garaheyyati.
mn103:16.5: Etam panavuso, dhammam appahaya nibbanam sacchikareyya’ti.
mn103:16.6: Samma byakaramano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam byakareyya:
mn103:16.7: ‘etam kho, avuso, dhammam appahaya na nibbanam sacchikareyya’ti.
mn103:17.1: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhum pare evam puccheyyum:
mn103:17.2: ‘ayasmata no ete bhikkhu akusala vutthapetva kusale patitthapita’ti?
mn103:17.3: Samma byakaramano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam byakareyya:
mn103:17.4: ‘idhaham, avuso, yena bhagava tenupasankamim, tassa me bhagava dhammam desesi, taham dhammam sutva tesam bhikkhunam abhasim.
mn103:17.5: Tam te bhikkhu dhammam sutva akusala vutthahimsu, kusale patitthahimsu’ti.
mn103:17.6: Evam byakaramano kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ceva attanam ukkamseti, na param vambheti, dhammassa canudhammam byakaroti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agacchati”ti.
mn103:17.8: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
